title: Earn Zone
description: EarnZone is a micro-task-based online platform where users can earn coins by completing small tasks. These coins can later be withdrawn or used for various services within the platform.

title: Volunteer Hub
description: Volunteer Hub is a community-driven platform connecting passionate individuals with volunteering opportunities. From environment to education, we help people give back, grow skills, and make a real impact.

title: Movie Portal
description: Discover the latest movies, top-rated classics, and trending trailersâ€”all in one place. Movie Portal is your gateway to the world of cinema, reviews, and entertainment updates.

title: Camping-Retreats
description: Escape the chaos and reconnect with nature through unforgettable camping and retreat experiences. From serene forests to mountain hideaways, we offer the perfect getaway for peace and adventure.

title: Fencing-Justified
description: Fencing-Justified is a responsive web layout built with HTML, Tailwind CSS, and JavaScript, featuring smooth interactive sliders powered by Swiper. It offers a clean, justified fencing-style design for an engaging user experience on all devices.

title: Alphabet_Game_Pro
description: Alphabet_Game_Pro is a JavaScript-based typing game where users type the shown letters without looking at the keyboard. Each correct input earns 1 point, helping improve reflexes and focus.
